snippet: Manu Ginobili scored 17 points and the Spurs, the No. 1 seed in the Western Conference, finished off a first-round sweep of the Utah Jazz.
abstract: San Antonio Spurs defeat Utah Jazz, 87-81, to sweep first-round playoff series, 4-0.
lead_paragraph: Manu Ginobili scored 17 points and the Spurs, the No. 1 seed in the Western Conference, finished off a first-round sweep of the Utah Jazz.

headline.seo: Manu Ginobili Helps Spurs Hold Off Jazz
headline.main: Ginobili Regains Touch, Helping Spurs Beat Jazz
